title: Dorseys Twitter stock gift well-timed to stem brain drain recruiters
text:
Dorsey's Twitter stock gift well-timed to stem brain drain: recruiters 
Reuters Top News Saturday 24th October, 2015 
TWTR.N ) Chief Executive Jack Dorsey's novel move to give a third of his company stock to an employee equity pool is a smart gesture to restore confidence in a company that lost its way, according to recruiting and compensation experts....
